column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I love Bavette's and other restaurants owned by these people. But as a professional musician
column2: I must point out the volume of the music. The music choices were great
column4: a nice surprise. But as most people are not musicians they don't realize the importance of a well balanced background. In fact
column5: people are usually so unaware of the music they don't even realize the conversation is getting compromised.
